block.prompt: Generate a title about the business idea: {{businessIdea}}
Generate a subtitle about the business idea: {{businessIdea}}
Create a captivating and succint feature title for a {{businessIdea}}. Consider the target audience, industry, and unique offerings. Be creative and concise. Provide a single feature title as output.
Generate a short description about the generated feature: {{feature}}

Create a captivating and succint feature title for a {{businessIdea}} that is different from this {{previousFeature}}. Consider the target audience, industry, and unique offerings. Be creative and concise. Provide a single feature title as output.
Generate a short description about the generated feature: {{feature}}

Create a different captivating and succint feature title for a {{businessIdea}} that is different from this {{previousFeature}}. Consider the target audience, industry, and unique offerings. Be creative and concise. Provide a single feature title as output.
Generate a short description about the generated feature: {{feature}}
Generate one testimony about the business idea: {{businessIdea}}, without placeholders
a generate a name, just the name, no other word
Generate a short call to action title about the business idea: {{businessIdea}}
